channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- Docs@Work
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- Docs@Work

item.title: CVE-2024-37403|2024-08-07T13:23:59.791Z -- ivanti -- docs%40work
item.description: Ivanti Docs@Work for Android, before 2.26.0 is affected by the 'Dirty Stream' vulnerability. The application fails to properly sanitize file names, resulting in a path traversal-affiliated vulnerability. This potentially enables other malicious apps on the device to read sensitive information stored in the app root.

item.title: CVE-2024-37403|2024-08-07T03:54:46.861Z -- ivanti -- docs%40work
item.description: Ivanti Docs@Work for Android, before 2.26.0 is affected by the 'Dirty Stream' vulnerability. The application fails to properly sanitize file names, resulting in a path traversal-affiliated vulnerability. This potentially enables other malicious apps on the device to read sensitive information stored in the app root.
